title: Finish project proposal
description: Complete the project proposal document and submit it before the deadline.

title: Prepare presentation slides
description: Create slides for the upcoming presentation.

project.title: Presentation
project.description: Presentation on the latest project updates

title: Review code
description: Review and provide feedback on the recent code changes.

title: Complete weekly report
description: Compile and submit the weekly progress report.

title: Schedule meeting
description: Arrange a meeting with the project team to discuss the roadmap.

title: Research new technology
description: Explore and evaluate the feasibility of implementing a new technology.

title: Update documentation
description: Revise and update project documentation to reflect recent changes.

title: Resolve customer issue
description: Address and resolve the reported customer issue.

title: Attend training session
description: Participate in the training session to enhance skills.

title: Deploy application update
description: Deploy the latest application update to the production environment.
